scripts.deploy:proxyadmin: bash -lc 'source .env && if [ -n "$DEPLOYER_ACCOUNT" ]; then SIGNER_ARGS="--account $DEPLOYER_ACCOUNT"; elif [ -n "$DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY" ]; then SIGNER_ARGS="--private-key $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY"; else echo "Set DEPLOYER_ACCOUNT or DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY in .env" >&2; exit 1; fi; forge script script/DeployProxyAdmin.s.sol --rpc-url $L2_RPC_URL $SIGNER_ARGS --broadcast --verify --verifier $VERIFIER --verifier-url $CHAIN_VERIFICATION_URL'
